NOTE: As of June 1, 2011 the current Ubuntu One contacts sync for mobile will no longer be active. Weâ€™re stopping support for our current service so we can focus our energy on launching a much better service sooner than we could otherwise.

== Contacts phone sync, public alpha ==

For questions about the service, see <nowiki>[[UbuntuOne-PhoneSync-FAQ]]</nowiki>

==== Set up your phone ====
===== Instructions =====
* Go to: https://one.ubuntu.com/phones/ (if the link is down, check our <nowiki>[[http://twitter.com/ubuntuone|twitter status]]</nowiki>)
* Select your phone model. If the model isn't listed, but you know it works, then proceed. We will give you a username and password to authenticate your phone with your Ubuntu One account.
** iPhone and Android phones can download the app directly from their respective app stores (web links for Android available at <nowiki>[[http://www.cyrket.com/p/android/com.funambol.androidsync/|Cyrket]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.appbrain.com/app/com.funambol.androidsync|AppBrain]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://code.google.com/p/funambol/|Google project site]]</nowiki>).
* '''Don't''' configure calender/notes sync or anything else that isn't contacts, no matter what the instructions tell you to do
* If your phone doesn't support syncml, download the client from here: https://www.forge.funambol.org/download/
* The host is: '''http://syncml.one.ubuntu.com'''
* DB name: '''card'''

===== Model gotchas =====
* iPhones, download the Ubuntu One app from the Apple app store
* Android phones, only 2.0x models are supported. Download the app from the Android Marketplace. 

==== Resetting your contacts ====
'''WARNING: THIS COMPLETELY DELETES EVERYTHING FOR EVER'''
* Download <nowiki>[[attachment:ubuntuone-couchdb-query]]</nowiki>
* Run: 
<pre>
python ubuntuone-couchdb-query --http-method=DELETE contacts
python ubuntuone-couchdb-query --http-method=PUT contacts
</pre>
* Delete your local contacts db from the couchdb admin:
<pre>
firefox .local/share/desktop-couch/couchdb.html
</pre>

===== Email clients =====
* Thunderbird 2: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/thunderbird/addon/8616
* Thunderbird 3 ''32 bit'': <nowiki>[[https://mozilla-plugin.forge.funambol.org/files/documents/89/367/funambol-mozilla-sync-client-linux-v20100317.xpi|Download]]</nowiki> and install the add-on
* Thunderbird 3 ''64 bit'': <nowiki>[[https://mozilla-plugin.forge.funambol.org/files/documents/89/368/funambol-mozilla-sync-client-linux-20100129-64bit.xpi|Download]]</nowiki> and install the add-on
* Evolution: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuOne/Tutorials/Contacts
